capabilities.title: More Cases, Less Labor
capabilities.body: Reduce manual workloads by automating repetitive enquiries inside Salesforce.

capabilities.title: AI that Understands Your Business
capabilities.body: Connect Agentforce and Einstein AI to your CRM and Knowledge Articles for accurate responses.

capabilities.title: Fast Implementation
capabilities.body: Deploy within weeks using Salesforce Agentforce frameworks designed for SMEs and enterprises.

capabilities.title: Powered by Salesforce
capabilities.body: Keep every interaction governed by your existing Salesforce data, processes, and permissions.

howItWorks.body: Link CRM records and Knowledge Articles so Agentforce can reference trusted answers.
Use Salesforce Agentforce and Einstein AI to understand enquiries and retrieve context.
Launch automation across channels and iterate using CRM history and agent feedback.

metrics.label: Manual workload reduction
metrics.caption: Less manual handling for repeat enquiries

ctaEndcap.title: Automate customer enquiry resolution with Salesforce Agentforce.
